content.chorus:
Standing, standing, standing
On the promises of God my Savior
Standing, standing,
I am standing on the promises of God
verses:
Standing on the promises of Christ my king
Through eternal ages let his praises ring:
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing
Standing on the promises of God

Standing on the promises that cannot fail
When the howling storms of doubt and fear assail
By the living word of God I shall prevail
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises I now can see
Perfect, present, cleasing in the blood for me
Standing in the liberty where Christ makes free
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord
Bound to him etermally by love's strong word
Overcoming daily with spirit's sword
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises cannot fail
Listening every moment to the spirit's call,
Resting in my savior as my all in all
Standing on the promises of God.
